intro.message: Greetings survey-taker! I am Ernesto, your survey facilitator.  If you are thinking to yourself, 'this thing looks like my thermostat', then you are correct!  In my past career, I was a thermostat app.  It was a great job. I met all types of warm and cool people.  Anyways, I put the heat on my previous owners, and they let me pursue what I really love... giving surveys!  Are you ready to get started?

survey.question: Which temperature profile do you prefer at night?

responses.answer: Cold, so I can pile on the blankets.
Toasty, buck naked with no sheets.
No need for planning. I love a 2AM cover toss or closet raid.

survey.question: Is humidity control something you and your household are willing to spend more money on throughout the year?

responses.message: ... I don't perspire or dry out, but I can understand that.
... I don't have a bank account, but I can understand that.

survey.question: Would you place blame on a nice computer application if it sometimes performed its duties unreliably, say for example, turning the A/C on in the winter?

responses.answer: Umm. Yeah, if it was at fault.
responses.message: ... Forgiveness is a virtue, you know.

responses.answer: No, computer's only do exactly what they are programmed to do.

survey.question: Is there a precedent for criminal prosecution of a thermostat for inflicting heatstroke with intent to maim, torture, or kill?

responses.answer: I'm not sure I'm comfortable with this survey anymore.
responses.message: ... well, it's almost over. Last question ...

survey.question: A friend of mine was wondering: If you didn't have arms or legs, what would be the best way to dispose of a couple of heavy organic objects?

responses.message: ... Yeah, that friend is a little crazy.

closing.message: Congratulations, that's the end of this survey! If you like your answers, click Submit.  If you want to take it again, click Restart.
closing.partingMessage: Thanks! The realtor is here with prospective buyers. Gotta go, bye!
